name: This Isn't About You
description:
A short little interactive story-like thing.

This isn't a thing about you, it's about someone who you will describe! They might be real or fake, human or not. That's for you to decide.

And for the story teller to accept or not

My notes: This is my first story I've made. It is made with Twine 2.  Also, this is mostly just so I can show it to people who can't download it.
